definition: to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage

sentences.english: The South Korean government spends millions promoting contemporary Korean culture abroad.
sentences.chinese: 韓國政府花了數百萬的錢推廣當代韓國文化。

sentences.english: This face-protecting structure has remarkable advantages and is worthy of popularizing.
sentences.chinese: 該護面結構優點顯著，有推廣應用的價值。

sentences.english: The Hamiltonian solution system is generalized to the Reissner-Mindlin thick plate problems.
sentences.chinese: 將哈密頓求解體系推廣應用於薄板彎曲問題。

sentences.english: Conception of agricultural technology popularization system at the new stage of China;
sentences.chinese: 健全的農業推廣體系是實現科技興農的組織保證。

sentences.english: F. Other the promotion behavior of all lawbreaking code.
sentences.chinese: 其他一切違反法律法規的推廣行爲。

sentences.english: In this speech, Dean Ching-yun Chuang promotes the importance of happiness.
sentences.chinese: 本講座我們邀請莊景雲主任來推廣快樂的重要性。

sentences.english: You are tired, do you still have time to popularize a website?
sentences.chinese: 你累不累啊，你還有時間去推廣網站嗎？

sentences.english: It is worth popularizing as a new type undersurface layer gradation of asphalt pavement.
sentences.chinese: 是一種值得推廣的新型瀝青路面下面層級配。

sentences.english: The image method of conductor is popularized.
sentences.chinese: 將導體鏡象法推廣應用到介質。

sentences.english: The method is simple to implement, has high accuracy, and can be widely used.
sentences.chinese: 該方法實現過程簡單，分類準確，可推廣性較強。

sentences.english: The communication mechanism in this paper can be extended to other communication mechanism besides serial devices in VxWorks.
sentences.chinese: 本文的方案可以推廣到串行設備以外的其它通信機制。

sentences.english: Promoting literacy is one of Laura Bush's main projects as first lady.
sentences.chinese: 推廣讀寫能力是蘿拉身爲第一夫人的主要計畫。

sentences.english: Aim To study dynamical behavior and travelling solutions of generalized BBM equation.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究了推廣的BBM方程的動力學行爲和行波解。

sentences.english: Clever uses of shopping bags in advertising campaigns by various companies.
sentences.chinese: 許多商家巧妙地利用購物袋來推廣自己的品牌。

sentences.english: This assess standard has achieved remarkable results after its wide spread and application at the whole Inc.
sentences.chinese: 經在全公司普及推廣運用，取得了顯著效果。

sentences.english: Later, aristocrats and literary figures helped expand the ceremony to common people.
sentences.chinese: 後來，貴族和文人學士把中秋祭月的傳統推廣到民間。

definition: to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
to pass through/to penetrate/by means of/via
to disseminate/to give publicity to/propaganda/CL:個|个[ge4]
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
